lenders.name: Neal

lenders.name: Royce
lenders.loan_because: My family wants to help

lenders.name: Rachel and Bill

lenders.occupational_info: I help large companies by writing computer programs for them to operate their business with.

lenders.name: Marissa

lenders.occupational_info: I like owls, and lamps, and owl-lamps.

lenders.name: Estella

lenders.name: Carole

lenders.occupational_info: The most important work I have done is raising two sons.

lenders.name: One Horizon Institute
lenders.loan_because: We are very excited about the work that Kiva is doing and believe that these kinds of grassroots efforts are an essential part of people joining together to build a world that works for everyone.
lenders.occupational_info: We are an international foundation working for the common good by supporting local initiatives aimed at creating a more just, peaceable, and satisfying future for all people.

lenders.name: Kjersti
lenders.loan_because: I liked the consept of helping people to help themself

lenders.name: Parikh Family

lenders.occupational_info: I work in IT for Health Care industry.

lenders.name: Kylene
lenders.loan_because: It's important to help small businesses thrive.

lenders.name: Hernan

lenders.name: Andrea
lenders.loan_because:
I am  loaning $180.00 on behalf of all of my favorite customer's who support me in my business, here in Canada, as a Sales Rep.
I am very fortunate to live in a country where you are rewarded for hard work.  I am also very passionate about empowering women so that they are unafraid and feel strong within themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: My work is interesting and rewarding.  I am able to travel around the province that I live in and no two days are ever the same. I meet with people all day and try to meet their needs by supplying their practices and business with quality accessories.  I work with many people who are entrepreneurs as well.  They own their own businesses aiding people with health care and products for the eyes.  It is wonderful work  but a great deal of driving!

lenders.name: Arielle

lenders.name: Branislav & Mirjana

lenders.occupational_info: We help our clients improve the quality of their workplace.

lenders.name: Debbie
lenders.loan_because: I want to make a difference in the world and I care about people.

lenders.name: Dana
lenders.loan_because: there are many people in the world who want to get out of the cycle of poverty but aren't given the opportunity to do so.  Kiva provides a fantastic opportunity for people to create or expand their business and provide for their families.

lenders.name: Shawn
lenders.loan_because: This is an interesting way to directly help others in the world.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with software and technology in the investment industry

lenders.name: Nichole

lenders.occupational_info: I make sure networks are running correctly so people worldwide can use the internet and make phone calls

lenders.name: Teena

lenders.occupational_info: I work with computers

lenders.loan_because: I am only one person & can only make a small impact in the world- but with Kiva that impact seems more "direct" for lack of a better term.

lenders.name: Carlo
lenders.loan_because: “Give a man a fish; you have fed him for today.  Teach a man to fish; and you have fed him for a lifetime”

lenders.name: Donna
lenders.loan_because: It's such a great way to reach out and touch someone.... and to make a big difference in a life with just a small gesture.

lenders.name: Gwen Roberts
lenders.loan_because: This account is the Gwen Roberts memorial fund setup by her Grandson. Gwen was an extremely generous women who I believe would have loved Kiva and the idea it represented. The aim of the fund is to pick people either living in one of the many countries Gwen travelled to or who through their work have some connection with Gwen. I belive giving others less fortunate the opportunity to help themselves is an especially fitting memorial to such an amazing woman.

lenders.name: Seth_Dickens_PornStar
lenders.loan_because: It makes me feel good to give.
lenders.occupational_info: I have sex on film. The way I look at it I save marriages =).

lenders.loan_because: This is an opportunity to give back and see the results.

lenders.name: Ann
lenders.loan_because: I want to make a difference in the world and this is a great way to help people help themselves.

lenders.name: Carol
lenders.loan_because: I grew up extremely poor so I know about trying to get out of poverty. A liitle help can go a long way to  fill in the gap and give encouragement.

lenders.name: roberta
lenders.loan_because: I believe in hope and empowerment through microfinancing.

lenders.name: John
lenders.loan_because: It make the world a better place.
lenders.occupational_info: John is an intuitive healer and certified massage therapist, who provides private healing sessions, life coaching, and mentoring in the practical application of the Universal Laws of Attraction, new paradigm business, and conscious life creation. John also leads groups, workshops, and retreats covering subjects ranging from cleansing and healing, to prosperity consciousness and sustainable living. John's life's work is to empower people to define, create, and live the life of their dreams.

lenders.name: Mitch
lenders.loan_because: Why not?

lenders.name: Claire
lenders.loan_because:
My job involves taking care of the medical needs of companion animals. And the pets I care for have access to better medical treatment than many humans around the world. So I loan as expiation for this immense injustice.
I am an atheist. When  your actions have a positive impact on people around you and/or on your community or the world in general, then you have done the "right thing". I don't need God/god/gods to tell me that.

lenders.name: Andrew
lenders.loan_because: microcredit loans are a great way to help others who are in need by allowing them to create a sustainable business capable of bettering their lives for years to come...
lenders.occupational_info: Colorado State University... GO RAMS!

lenders.name: Katherine
lenders.loan_because: Helping people is what we should all be doing in these troubled times.

lenders.loan_because: it can help

lenders.name: Gary

lenders.occupational_info: I work with people who have been injured or become ill to regain their indepedance.

lenders.name: Susanne
lenders.loan_because: I loan to entrepreneurs via Kiva because I am inspired by their dedication to their business, family, and community. I hope that my small contribution will help bring them success.

lenders.name: Jairemarie
lenders.loan_because: I want to give in a way that helps people keep their dignity and build self-esteem through small business ownership. I also appreciate the human connection which makes giving through Kiva a real joy.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a food writer and cooking teacher and am committed to helping people understand the benefits of eating local, organically grown food.

lenders.name: Harald
lenders.loan_because: I want to contribute because I can
lenders.occupational_info: I work in a local utility company as controller

lenders.name: Leah

I work the shift from nighttime till the morning.

lenders.name: Matias
lenders.loan_because: I can
lenders.occupational_info: Business student

lenders.name: Candyce
lenders.loan_because: This is a tremendous way to help others!  Since the loan is paid  back it gives the oppurtunity to help several people with the same donation.  This site also allows people who feel they have little to give to really make a difference in someone's life.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in Aquaculture (Fish Farming) as a biologist.  I have a small company that offers services to help people improve their production quality.

lenders.loan_because: every bit helps.

lenders.occupational_info: Since I am retired I spent a lot of time on my hobbies: photography and travel.

lenders.name: Andreas
lenders.loan_because: I am privileged to be in a position where I can make a positive influence on the lives of others.

lenders.occupational_info: im disabled i do not work anymore

lenders.name: Jeanette
lenders.loan_because: I think it's the best way to help people.
lenders.occupational_info: Norwegian Web Developer.

lenders.name: Gunilla
lenders.loan_because: I am so privileged, living in a country that is not in war (for over 100 years ), I can eat plenty of food every day I have 3 healthy kids and 3 healty grandkids so I do want to help others who is not so lucky and have to struggle to survive.
lenders.occupational_info: I work 6 days a week in my restaurant making lunch and dinner for hungry people

lenders.name: Annika+Robert+Elliott
lenders.loan_because: I want to help someone to get a better life

lenders.name: Inge Andre
lenders.loan_because: I hope it will help some people that needs it.

lenders.name: Kathrine
lenders.loan_because: When using kiva I know that all the money goes to some who really needs it and because you most likely get the money back you can help more people with the same money, it's just great ..
lenders.occupational_info: I work in a clothing store

lenders.name: Tim
lenders.loan_because: "What do we live for if not to make life less difficult for each other?" In developed countries we live in abundance and should remember that others are less fortunate partly because we prevent them from sharing in our abundance.
lenders.occupational_info: Power Ergonomics...more power and less pain, improved performance and retained health in work, sports and leisure

lenders.name: Sjefsfragle
lenders.loan_because: I would like to help people by giving them the opportunity to care for them selves and the comunty around them
lenders.occupational_info: I rent out planes in all shapes and sizes

lenders.name: Mom-Dad-Killian-Vince
lenders.loan_because: We belive that we can help others and that makes us happy! We want to teach our sons how important it is to help others.
lenders.occupational_info: At the moment Mirre is a stay-at-home-mom. And Thomas works at Ericsson.

lenders.name: sten-åke
lenders.loan_because: I what to help people that dont have so mutch and nead so litle to get a  better life.I even have a child in india that i help(a little boy) that i send money every month, and before that i had a girl in southern india

lenders.name: Jessica
lenders.loan_because: I have more than I need!

lenders.name: Loom
lenders.loan_because: think its great
lenders.occupational_info: wine producer

lenders.name: Amanda
lenders.loan_because: I believe in peace through prosperity.

lenders.name: Mark
lenders.loan_because: It makes me feel good, plus it makes you want to give when you see them really trying hard to better themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: I hire stock brokers to come work at my firm to buy and sell stocks for their clients so they become rich.

lenders.name: Kolonihagen
lenders.loan_because: We believe in the saying «Give a man a fish and he will eat for a day. Teach him how to fish and he will eat for a lifetime». We hope this loan will be the basis of a sustainable grass-root business.

lenders.name: Bert-Jan
lenders.loan_because: I believe in entrepreneurship for those who can!
lenders.occupational_info: making online banking

lenders.name: Rui Gouveia
lenders.loan_because:
Because I can!
Because I believe the world could (should) be a better place if everybody helps...

lenders.name: Frederic
lenders.loan_because: helping others help themselves is the best way to change the world.

lenders.name: Thomas
lenders.loan_because: I think micropayments, microlending, and small-scale entrepeneurship are just as cool as any fucking Wal-Mart on the planet.

lenders.name: Elisabeth
lenders.loan_because:
“If anyone has material possessions and sees his brother in need but has no pity on him, how can the love of God be in him? Dear children, let us not love with words or tongue but with actions and in truth.” 1. John 3:17-18
“Give to the one who asks you, and do not turn away from the one who wants to borrow from you.” Matt. 5:42

lenders.name: Wayne
lenders.loan_because: being a business owner is all about hope....and I want to help other hope for a better world.
lenders.occupational_info: We develop transport systems for small to midsize companies all over Canada.

lenders.name: Veronica
lenders.loan_because: I´m fortune that I can, and with love and respect give a helping hand.

lenders.name: Janet
lenders.occupational_info:
nova scotia 
canada

lenders.name: holley
lenders.loan_because: I hope to help working mothers support their children.
lenders.occupational_info: I write about food and farming for a magazine in the U.S.

lenders.name: Don
lenders.loan_because: I understand the difference between a handout and a hand up.
lenders.occupational_info: I live very simply  in retirement, i occassionally work as an electrician,or airconditioning repair technician.

lenders.name: Michael
lenders.loan_because: I can make a difference.

lenders.name: Justin Milam
lenders.loan_because: everyone in this world deserves the opportunity to be successful.

lenders.name: Gina
lenders.loan_because: I can

lenders.name: Russ and Carla
lenders.loan_because: I am able to....

lenders.name: Per M
lenders.loan_because: It works!

lenders.name: Maria
lenders.loan_because: I hope that someone would do the same for me - if I was the one that needed help.

lenders.name: Gross-Lichtenberg Family
lenders.loan_because: We want to make the world a better place for our beautiful daughters.

lenders.name: Samantha
lenders.loan_because:
I can.

I only have A+ as my team because I dislike the stereotype of Atheists not being charitable. As much as I would like to join other teams that I have a common interest with, I would prefer not to dilute my funds so that I can help dispel this negative stereotype.
lenders.occupational_info: Humanist, Traveler, Mother, Tree Hugger, Do-Gooder.

lenders.name: Mark
lenders.loan_because: I want to share the blessings I have received with others around the world.
lenders.occupational_info: I operate a chemical manufacturing plant which makes sulfuric acid.

lenders.name: Orlando
lenders.loan_because: I believe that capitalism is the best path to prosperity and prosperity is the best path to peace.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people buy or sell there home.

lenders.name: Lori
lenders.loan_because: I believe everyone should have the opportunity to live their dreams and to provide for themselves and their families.

lenders.name: Joseph
lenders.loan_because: It's good business.
lenders.occupational_info: I manage the specialty agriculture portfolio of a global food ingredients manufacturer.

lenders.name: Jim & Rimma
lenders.loan_because: This is an excellent way to help end world poverty along with networking online.
lenders.occupational_info:
We provide tools and opportunities that bring together people to pool resources and ideas online for the betterment of all.
We are a blessing by sharing a blessing.

lenders.name: Adam B.
lenders.loan_because: I want to help someone who needs the money more than I do.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a CPA for a private investment firm and a professional bowler.

lenders.name: Shirley
lenders.loan_because: Because giving and sharing are an important part of who I am.
lenders.occupational_info: I am the Executive Assistant to the Chief of Police in our city.  I handle his schedule, work with him in preparing documents and letters, and generally assist in the running of the Police Department.

lenders.name: Darlene
lenders.loan_because: I am very blessed in my life.  All my need are met, I ahve a wonderful healthy family and I'm so thankful.  To whom much is given much is expected.  We need to care for others and honor their hard work.  This is such an easy thing to do.

lenders.name: Edson
lenders.loan_because: I believe I can contribute in a small way to a better world by giving others a chance to succeed.  I think the idea of being able to "recycle" my funds is great way to do this.
lenders.occupational_info: Retired and I contribute 2 days a week as an Animal Care Volunteer at the Arizona-Sonora Desert Museum.

lenders.name: Megan
lenders.loan_because: I want to help those who sincerely need and want help.  I believe that these people will take what little we give them and do the real hard work themselves to change their lives.

lenders.name: Caroline
lenders.loan_because: I know how hard it is to build and maintain a small business and wanted to help women in other areas of the world have a chance at success just like I did!
lenders.occupational_info: I have been in business for 20 years helping my clients financially plan for the present and the future.  I am very greatful for all of the great friendships I have develped over the years and am now planning my own retirement which will begin at the end of this year.

lenders.name: Asia/Grant Services-TRF
lenders.loan_because: The work we do helps those in need and to give money and hear from the beneficiaries will make a difference in our day to day work.

lenders.name: Thomas
lenders.loan_because: I believe that entrepreneurs can change their communities for the better.
lenders.occupational_info: I am an independent software developer. I work with nonprofit, for profit, small and large businesses.

lenders.name: marian
lenders.loan_because:
A little of my money can have a huge result for someone else.  In my world it is easy to give myself another sweater or a new pair of shoes and this money I spend on myself will have no long term effect; however, a small loan via KIVA can change someone's tomorrow.
My resolution for 2008 is to give to others as often as I give to myself.
lenders.occupational_info: At Purdue University, I coordinate as a volunteer a collection of framed and matted prints that faculty and staff can borrow (like a book from the library) for 12 to 36 months to hang in their campus office or work areas.  This program is a wonderful way to add color and beauty to our campus.

lenders.name: Elaine
lenders.loan_because: I want to help women become self sufficient.
lenders.occupational_info: I was a teacher in public schools for 35 years.

lenders.name: WIT-NC
lenders.occupation: Women in International Trade, Northern California
lenders.occupational_info: Women in International Trade - Northern California (WIT-NC) is a non-profit organization founded in 1989.   WIT-NC has been a trusted resource for the San Francisco Bay Area, providing programs, training and education in global trade to local trade professionals.  As an active force in the international trade community, WIT-NC works to expand business skills and public awareness of international trade issues.

lenders.name: Graham
lenders.loan_because: it feels good...sometimes all people need is a chance.

lenders.name: Joy
lenders.loan_because: I want to help  people around the world, obtain loans that  can change lives. Thank You KIVA! :) I heard a news story on NPR about a lady who received a small loan to buy cell phones. She then rented out the phone time for a huge profit. It changed the lives of everyone in the village. This mother was able to provide for her kids and send them to school, which is a luxury for her village.

lenders.name: Garage Productions
lenders.loan_because: We want to make a difference and to give back.
lenders.occupational_info: Print and web design services.

lenders.name: Anne-Marie
lenders.loan_because: I think that dignity is one of the most serious poverties in this world: " I don't need charity, I need to be offered a chance to make a life for myself!"
lenders.occupational_info: I help guests have a lovely meal and a special night out!

lenders.name: Anthony
lenders.loan_because: It makes the world go around.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach English in Korea.

lenders.name: Gina
lenders.loan_because: There is no happiness in having or in getting, but only in giving” - Henry Drummond
lenders.occupational_info: I design custom storage units for closets to help people organize their belongings.

lenders.name: Chris
lenders.loan_because: It's a good way for people in developing countries to both help themselves and also their communities
lenders.occupational_info: I help businesses become more efficient and profitable

lenders.name: Sunni
lenders.loan_because: I care

lenders.name: CARLOS
lenders.loan_because: I can. And yes, it feels good!
lenders.occupational_info: Dreaming it could happen...

lenders.name: Next Plateau Consulting
lenders.loan_because: Small businesses and entrepreneurship have made our country great and I believe they can make the difference in other parts of the world as well.
lenders.occupational_info: Helping private business owners with tax, legal and finance issues so they can concentrate on being successful in their chosen trade.

lenders.name: Kay & Jim
lenders.loan_because: To help other entreprenuers without the same opportunites for raising capital as we have here in the US.  To share our good fortune so others will succeed and share theirs.
lenders.occupational_info: We are like most others in the Kiva program, entreprenuers.  We started our business in the garage, and 25 years later have grown to over 40 employees,

lenders.name: Christopher
lenders.loan_because: I started a business several years ago and I know that capital is important to make a business successful.  I hope, in a small way,  to add to the success that these business men and women will have.
lenders.occupational_info: I manage my client's investment portfolios.

lenders.name: Kristine
lenders.loan_because: It is a sustainable way of helping others and it is transparent for the lender.
lenders.occupational_info: Technical assistance for companies in developing countries contributing to sustainable economic development

lenders.name: Doug
lenders.loan_because: We are so fortunate in our country to have so much.  KIVA opens a unique doorway for discussion on different countries, cultures and ways of life.  To be able to help in a small way with this type of “investment” is such a positive example for our children.

lenders.name: Sofia
lenders.loan_because: I want to make a diffrent.

lenders.name: Theresa M.
lenders.loan_because: it is a good thing to do and I can do it safely
lenders.occupational_info:
I take care of the elderly in their homes or in the hospitals.
I also teach people to swim because I believe in the importance of exercise and this is an exercise which can be done by anyone regardless of age,  or mental or physical abilities

lenders.name: In memory of Gaye Sims
lenders.loan_because: I lost my loving wife at the too young age of 43 due to Cancer.  Gaye always taught me to help others.  This is a very small tribute to my soul mate.

lenders.name: Storey
lenders.loan_because: We know what a difference one to one interactions can make. We want to be a part of making the world a friendlier and more equitable place.
lenders.occupational_info: We have a commercial real estate broker, a  political consultant, a volleyball coach, a restaurant owner and a sushi chef in this family. Also 2 college students.

lenders.name: Wayne
lenders.loan_because: It's the age old "giving fish" versus "supporting a fishing venture" argument

lenders.name: Patrick
lenders.loan_because: I want to do my part to help people across the world persue their dreams.
lenders.occupational_info: I manage computer and telephone systems for large companies.

lenders.name: Tracy
lenders.loan_because: Everyone should have the opportunity to support their family, provide education for their children, and do something they are interested in.

lenders.name: Kathleen
lenders.occupation: Lover of travel, food, wine, friends, family, dogs

lenders.name: Sara
lenders.loan_because: I think this is one of the best ways to support others. I really like the Kiva concept, and I´m proud to be a part of your work! Thank you!
lenders.occupational_info: I´m working with global marketing for the company Logosol, the world’s biggest seller of portable sawmills.

lenders.name: Eva
lenders.loan_because: I love giving people a hand up instead of a hand out. It makes the world a better place each time someone who was down and out improves their life. I feel like Kiva gives me the opportunity to make the world a better place.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people who are in crisis. For example someone who is going through a divorce or who has lost their job, or who doesn't like their job and wants to change but doesn't know what they want to do. I teach them how to find the strength within themselves to move forward and feel good about their life and themselves. It is very rewarding.

lenders.name: Nate
lenders.loan_because: Free market capitalism is the key to PROSPERITY!
